thread.title: WATCH: Despondent Wolves fans and Tim Spiers on Boro defeat
thread.title_full: WATCH: Despondent Wolves fans and Tim Spiers on Boro defeat

title: WATCH: Despondent Wolves fans and Tim Spiers on Boro defeat
text:
Log in and start commenting 
David Edwards gave Wolves a first-half lead they fully merited and in the second half they continued to be the better side. 
But spurned chances - most pertinently a James Henry shot that Boro keeper Dimi Konstantopoulos somehow pushed wide - and several outstanding last-ditch blocks from the visitors cost Kenny Jackett's team dearly. Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
